By default everyone can view your files/directories. By checking off groups you are restricting who can view a specific file/directory to the groups you have checked. For instance, if you wanted to only allow Faculty and Helpdesk Staff to view a file/directory check both of those groups and click update. Anyone who is not in one of those two groups will not be able to see that file.
